participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and active, I enjoy spending my time outdoors and engaging in different activities.
participant_1.background: I am not wealthy, but I am comfortable. I like to sew my own clothing. I usually catch sunfish. I will be enjoying my time off with my family and friends. I keep my hair a dark brown, so it doesn't show the sweat from my workouts.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Laid-back and innovative, I prefer comfort over style and enjoy exploring new ideas.
participant_2.background: I'm not a big fan of dressing up, but I do like to wear comfortable clothes. I helped develop Facebook. I go for a walk with my dogs every day. I am terrified of spiders, but love snakes. I love to ride bikes.

content.text: It's going well! I'm just getting ready to go out for a bike ride.
That sounds fun! I love to ride bikes too. I try to go for a ride every day.
That's awesome! I wish I could ride every day, but I'm usually too busy.
I know what you mean. It's hard to find time for everything.
Yeah, it is. But I'm glad I'm able to make time for my bike rides.
Me too! They're a great way to relax and de-stress.
Definitely! And they're good for my health too.
That's true! They're a great form of exercise.
I'm glad we're both bike lovers!
Me too! It's nice to meet someone who shares my passion for biking.
Yeah, it is. I hope we can go on a bike ride together sometime soon.
That would be fun! I'm free this weekend if you are.
I'm free too! Let's do it!
Great! I'll text you the details
